monsters.name: Goblin
monsters.description: A small but vicious creature that roams the dungeon.

monsters.name: Skeleton Warrior
monsters.description: A reanimated skeleton that fights with a rusty sword.

monsters.name: Troll
monsters.description: A large, brutish monster known for its regenerative health.

monsters.name: Orc
monsters.description: A fearsome warrior with a strong physique and ruthless combat skills.

bosses.name: Minotaur
bosses.special_ability_effect: Deals massive area-of-effect damage to all players in range.
bosses.description: A powerful and aggressive beast that guards the dungeon's deepest levels.

bosses.name: Dark Sorcerer
bosses.special_ability_effect: A powerful bolt of dark energy that damages a single target heavily.
bosses.description: A master of dark magic, capable of devastating spells and mind control.

bosses.name: Dragon King
bosses.special_ability_effect: Breathes fire in a cone, dealing heavy damage to all targets in the area.
bosses.description: An ancient and mighty dragon who has ruled the dungeon for centuries.
